item.title: Introducing Forward – my latest project
item.dc:creator: Peter
item.description:
Forward is my latest project and allow you to donate your old stuff to our platform. When someone buy your stuff money goes to a charity you have chosen. Both an iPhone and Android app is available from respective stores and you’re able to read much more about this cool project from our Forward web … Continue reading Introducing Forward – my latest project

The post Introducing Forward – my latest project appeared first on Peter Theill Site.
item.content:encoded:
Forward is my latest project and allow you to donate your old stuff to our platform. When someone buy your stuff money goes to a charity you have chosen.

Both an iPhone and Android app is available from respective stores and you’re able to read much more about this cool project from our Forward web site.

The post Introducing Forward – my latest project appeared first on Peter Theill Site.
